mwb_ayf_part2: KUBWIRIZA MU RUHAME. Tangiza ikiganiro mu gace gakorerwamo imirimo y’ubucuruzi, ukoresheje inkuru y’Ubwami. (lmd isomo rya 1 ingingo ya 4)
